 if the beta HCG value doubles in 48 hours it is most likely an early intra-uterine pregnancy and
ul
trasound can be repeated in two weeks’ time
 if the beta HCG value increase by less than ⅔rds it is most likely an ectopic pregnancy
o if the value decreases it may be possible to manage the patient conservatively or with medical
management; discuss with your specialist referral hospital for further management.
